articles.title: Don't reserve good ratings only for 350-plus pitches: Rahul Dravid - IndiaTimes
articles.description: Cricket News: India coach Rahul Dravid has criticized the ICC for rating the pitches in the India-Pakistan and India-Australia games as 'average'. Dravid believes t
articles.content: World Cup, India vs New Zealand: India aim to break New Zealand jinxIndia have not defeated New Zealand in a World Cup match since 2003. New Zealand's team has mastered the art of surprise and adapta… [+163 chars]
